Articles.Content:
I don't watch Doctor Who. (Yes, you read that right.)

Press to get a copy of the new Universe Sandbox game. 9.8677% chance it won't work, or 28.98898% chance it's the old one.

Why not?

*Presses the button*

Press to bring true and unforgiving justice.

Nope *Doesn't press*

Press to go anywhere you wish, 3.68368r% chance you will be strapped into my next (Fail) Duna rocket

No no no no no no no no no NO.

Press to teleport to a random location. 90% chance you teleport to the core of Chernobyl's No. 4 reactor. 9% chance you get teleported into the core of the sun. 1% chance you teleport to the inside of a neutron star.

I'll pretend to press the button and claim it doesn't work, then leave it as schmuck bait.

Press the button to get a .craft that can land three kerbals, a rover, and an ion glider on any planet, and return the kerbals. But all the craft you've built previously get corrupted, and your backup copies of them too.

Nah... *Accidentally presses button* NOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!! (Nice .craft though, but if it has too many parts then... *Punches computer screen*)

Press the button and there is a 49.999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999% chance that you'll be teleported to Mars with a space suit and a button to teleport back to Earth, and a 51.111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111% chance that you'll be teleported to Mars with nothing but a thong.

heck no. *doesn't press*

press the button for homestuck to update but the update is that hussie says he's gonna cancel homestuck forever

I don't know what that is supposed to mean. I will not press it.

If you press the button, you will live long, be rich and famous and generally have a very good life, however after you die, you will get Tantalus' punishment. Google it.

Did not need to Google, and not pressing.

Press the button and your flight on Virgin Galactic's SpaceShipTwo is half paid for. But if you can't raise the other half yourself by the end of 2015, the legal wrangling will bankrupt you.

No. I will never have the money...

Press to become a living object on earth. You won't get to chose.

I deny the button as I like the way I am.

Press the button to have 50% chance living in an amazing steampunk world or 50% of living in a steampunk world based in a post-apocalyptic world after the devastating great war never ended though it still somewhat amazing.

*Presses*

Press the button and a robot will flip a coin. If it's heads you get Ã‚Â£1000, if it's tails you get Ã‚Â£1000 in Monopoly money, if it's edge you die in excruciating agony.

Press it cause it not in my currency.

Press button to receive a blueberry muffin with a 5% chance of receiving a raisin muffin.

Press. Both will probably be yummy.

Press the button and you will be rickrolled within the next week when you're least expecting it.

Now that i know it, i'll be expecting it to happen everytime, so *presses*

Press the button and you'll get on a vacation with Jeb, but at the end of the vacation he'll strap you to an SRB

I rather not press it i prefer to stay on the ground ,or be in a plane.

Press button to have an apple pie with a 5% chance of receiving a pear pie.

Presses.

Press the button and you have a 100% chance of never seeing a pie again. Don't press it and you'll get pied in the face when you get your 15 minutes of fame.

I won't. What are the odds I'll ever get my 15min of fame?

Press the button for an apocalypse. Nothing is certain except for the fact that you will survive the initial cause of the apocalypse, whatever that will be. However the rest is up to you.

Edited June 28, 2014 by xrayfishx

no i could get stuck with a crappy one

press to earn a free 2 way flight to Titan but it will take ten years to make the voyage and another 10 to get back

Not pressing cause I love life on this here earth until they can speed that up till then I shall not press.

Press button to get "Huzzah" but have a chance of a super loud "Huzzah."

*Presses*

AH MY EARS!

Press the button for a trip on the next flight in KSP of a randomly-chosen forum member.

don't press

press the button to bring back breaking bad and firefly but you will lose two other shows

Nah

Press and you'll get a potato, but with a 5% of it growing ridiculously fast and eating the universe

No, I don't like potatoes THAT much...

PRESS FOR 100 COOKIES with 1% chance of DEATH.

No, I don't like potatoes THAT much...

PRESS FOR 100 COOKIES with 1% chance of DEATH.

Hell yes. 1% is a negligible risk, that I'm willing to acce- *gack*

PRESS FOR ANTIGRAVITY.
